settings.desc:
Equipped with the strongest and most durable IP66 weatherproof case for all-season security.

Say goodbye forever to messy wires searching for the nearest power outlet, constantly changing batteries and dangerous loss of coverage during power outages.

settings.cons1: Cameras must be set within wifi range
settings.note1: Support 2.4G Wi-Fi band only, 5Ghz is not supported. Compatible with almost any router.
settings.pros2: Set up camera in more locations, as long as there's network coverage
settings.note2: FREE SIM Card included with 100MB of free data & zero activation costs. Works with Verizon, AT&T or T-Mobile.

settings.wtitle: No extra charge. Powerful 5W solar panel.
Four powerful white LED lights.Clear color vision in the dark.
settings.ctitle: One small LED light.Low quality color vision in the dark.

settings.wtitle: H.264/265 - Images & Videos take small amount of space
settings.ctitle: H.264 - Images & Videos take double the space

settings.wtitle: Records instantly so you see all the action. Receive alerts in 0.1 - 2 seconds.
settings.ctitle: Records too late, misses the action. Alerts are slowly sent out. Typically 3-10 seconds

settings.wtitle: Up to 128GB Cloud storage Or both for more protection
settings.ctitle: Up to 64GB Only offer cloud storage

settings.wtitle: IP66 Rating Low chance of having water inside of the camera during extreme weather condition. Strong metal bracket with metal bolts making it very sturdy during strong winds/hurricanes.
settings.ctitle: IP65 Rating High chance of having water inside of the camera during extreme weather. Magnetic cable making it unreliable during strong winds/hurricanes.

settings.wtitle: 3 minute installation.Setup video guides available on our website.
settings.ctitle: Lengthy installation procedures.No setup video tutorials.

settings.wtitle: Quick responses, Toll-free number, Easy to reach management
settings.ctitle: Slow responses.Toll-free number. Hard to reach management.

settings.wtitle: Purchase Cloud Storage or Use SD Card for Free Storage
settings.ctitle: Purchase Cloud Storage or Use SD Card, pay monthly to access footage

settings.title: USB Cable (used to initially charge the batteries)

settings.desc: Full color detailed image at night
